item.title: React in Figwheel from Scratch
item.description: Edit: 2017-07-30 Since publishing the original post, the Clojurescript team implemented CLJS-2280, which handles the work of shimming process.env for us. As if that wasn’t enough, the team also released Clojurescript 1.9.854, meaning that we no longer need to build the latest version of Clojurescript from source! The other thing that changed is that :npm-deps are no longer installed automatically, and the newly-added :install-deps build property is not yet supported in lein-figwheel, so I’m holding off on updating the tutorial until Figwheel catches up for us üëç
